thread.title: thomas kinsey
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by thomas kinsey

author: thomas kinsey
title: thomas kinsey
text: I installed the unit as directed and have moved it several times and turn the antenna in all directions. All my lights are green but the only good reception is in the same room as the inside antenna is located. I will keep the unit but it is not what it is advertise to be.
